title: Please please help...
body: My champion stays there, it can't move no matter how much you click. Whats annoying it's that the champion can't move, but the game still goes on so i can be killed, and its not a problem with my mouse. Please help so i can get back to playing .-.

replies.body: I don't want to steer you in the wrong direction since there are a few different things that could be causing this. Are any of your other keybinds being weird, or are you seeing any strange movements with the minions or other champions?

Not really, the only thing that's happening is that once a 2-3 minutes the my champion freezes in place, I can chat and purchase items, but not move. Rarely, the Attempting to reconnect sign flashes on screen but leaves instantly.

This definitely sounds like packet loss to me! We can easily confirm this by taking your recent game logs that gave you issues, pop it into our [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743), then let me know what it says about your packet loss!
So I checked the logs and there was an 8.98% packet loss in them.

Yeeeeeep that confirms my thoughts. Packet loss is when parts of the data get lost between your network and our server. There's not a whole lot we can do about packet loss on our end, but hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we can take a closer look.
Thanks a lot anyways, you're very kind ^-^ I'll submit the ticket and try my best to find a solution.
